body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore       The Bookstore is administered by Eastern National, and is open seven days a week, 8:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M., except Thanksgiving, Christmas Day and New Year's Day. Address inquiries to:   Wilson's Creek National Battlefield c/o Eastern National 6424 W. Farm Road 182 Republic, MO 65738-9514 (417) 732-2662, extension 227   Our most popular sales items may also be ordered on-line by clicking here, then selecting Wilson's Creek NB.
title: Wilson's Creek National Battlefield: Bookstore
